Back: Are you sure you want to do this?
Назад: Дали сте сигурни дека сакате да го направете ова?

Back: Are you sure you want to revoke the user's tokens?
Назад: Are you sure you want to revoke the user's tokens?

Back: Please correct the password reset token.
Назад: Please correct the password reset token.

Back: Please specify the correct account and try again.
Назад: Please specify the correct account and try again.

Back: Your password reset link has expired.
Назад: Линкот за ресетирање на лозинката помина.

Back: We're unable to send the password reset email.
Назад: We're unable to send the password reset email.

Back: We'll email you a link to reset your password.
Назад: Ќе ви пратиме емаил со линк за ресетирање на лозинката.
Ве молиме корегирајте ја емаил адресата:

Back: You cannot delete your own account.
Назад: You cannot delete your own account.

Back: You have entered an invalid password for current user.
Назад: You have entered an invalid password for current user.

Back: We can't find a user to delete.
Назад: We can't find a user to delete.

Back: You have revoked the user's tokens.
Назад: You have revoked the user's tokens.

Back: We can't find a user to revoke.
Назад: We can't find a user to revoke.

Back: An error occurred while deleting this role.
Назад: An error occurred while deleting this role.

Back: An error occurred while saving this role.
Назад: An error occurred while saving this role.

Back: A user with the same user name or email already exists.
Назад: A user with the same user name or email already exists.

Back: Sorry, but this password has already been used. Please create another.
Назад: Sorry, but this password has already been used. Please create another.

Back: You did not sign in correctly or your account is temporarily disabled.
Назад: Не се најавивте точно или вашиот профил е привремено оневозможен.

Back: You need more permissions to access this.
Назад: You need more permissions to access this.

Back: User Name is a required field.
Назад: User Name is a required field.

Back: First Name is a required field.
Last Name is a required field.
Your password must be at least %1 characters.
Назад: Лозинката мора да содржи барем %1 карактери.

Back: Your password must include both numeric and alphabetic characters.
Назад: Your password must include both numeric and alphabetic characters.

Back: Your password confirmation must match your password.
Назад: Your password confirmation must match your password.

Back: It's time to change your password.
Назад: It's time to change your password.

Back: It's time to change your password.
Назад: It's time to change your password.

Back: Your password has expired; please contact your administrator.
Назад: Your password has expired; please contact your administrator.

Back: Enter your email address.  You will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
Назад: Внесете ја вашата емаил адреса. Ќе добиете емаил порака со линк за ресетирање на вашата лозинка.

Back: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove this user from already assigned role\r\nAre you sure?
Назад: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove this user from already assigned role\r\nAre you sure?

Back: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove those users from already assigned roles\r\nAre you sure?
Назад: Warning!\r\nThis action will remove those users from already assigned roles\r\nAre you sure?

Back: There was recently a request to change the password for your account.
Назад: Неодамна беше побарано да ја смените лозинката за вашиот профил.

Back: If you requested this change, reset your password here:
Назад: Доколку вие поднесовте барање за оваа промена, поставете нова лозинка овде:

Back: If you did not make this request, you can ignore this email and your password will remain the same.
Назад: Доколку не го поднесовте вие ова барање, игнорирајте ја оваа порака и вашата лозинка ќе остане иста.

Back: We have received a request to change the following information associated with your account at %store_name: %changes.
Назад: Добивме барање за промена на следните информации во врска со вашиот профил на %store_name: %changes.

Back: If you have not authorized this action, please contact us immediately at %store_email
Назад: Доколку не ја одобрувате оваа промена, ве молиме контактирајте не веднаш на %store_email

Back: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.
Назад: Email template chosen based on theme fallback when "Default" option is selected.

Back: Maximum Login Failures to Lockout Account
Назад: Maximum Login Failures to Lockout Account

Back: We will disable this feature if the value is empty.
Назад: We will disable this feature if the value is empty.

Back: The password for your account has been successfully changed.
Назад: The password for your account has been successfully changed.

Back: If you did not request this change, please contact us.
Назад: If you did not request this change, please contact us.

Back: A new admin account was created for %first_name, %last_name using %email.
Назад: A new admin account was created for %first_name, %last_name using %email.

Back: The password entered for the current user is invalid. Verify the password and try again.
Назад: The password entered for the current user is invalid. Verify the password and try again.

Back: The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.
Назад: The account sign-in was incorrect or your account is disabled temporarily. Please wait and try again later.

Back: More permissions are needed to access this.
Назад: More permissions are needed to access this.

Back: The password reset token is incorrect. Verify the token and try again.
Назад: The password reset token is incorrect. Verify the token and try again.

Back: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.
Назад: Your account is temporarily disabled. Please try again later.

Back: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Назад: "User Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Назад: "First Name" is required. Enter and try again.

Back: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.
Назад: "Last Name" is required. Enter and try again.
